item.title: Need d claws help
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

silabgarza:

make it do doubles twice or just use a new void in the process causing 1 hit per second for 2 seconds lols

If you do it this way, make sure there’s a delay between attack 2&3.

Read full topic

item.title: Need d claws help
item.dc:creator: @hiots hiots
item.description:
@hiots wrote:

Okay here it is

   public void DClawsSpecial() {
        if (IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7810) {
            setAnimation(2068);
            actionTimer = 4;
            SpecDamgNPC(4);
            DDS2Damg = true;
            DDStimer = 1;
            resetAnimation();
            teleportToX = absX;
            teleportToY = absY;
            SpecDamgNPC(4);
            SpecialDelay -= 3;
        } else if (IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7810) {
            int j = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX;
            int k = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY;
            int l = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].playerLevel[playerHitpoints];

            SpecDamg(4);
            DDS2Damg = true;
            DDStimer = 1;
            startAnimation(2068);
            actionTimer = 4;
            teleportToX = absX;
            teleportToY = absY;
            SpecialDelay -= 3;
        }
    }
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7810 && specialAmount <= 49) { // dclaw
specialDamage = 0;
specialDamage2 = 0;
sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left.");
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7810 && specialAmount >= 50) { // dclaw
DClawsSpecial();
specialAmount -= 50;
}
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7810
                                            && specialAmount >= 50) {
                                        ProjectileSpec(252, absY, absX, offsetY,
                                                offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY,
                                                EnemyX);
                                        ProjectileSpec(252, absY, absX, offsetY,
                                                offsetX, attacknpc, EnemyY,
                                                EnemyX);
                                        calculateSpecial();
                                        DClawsSpecial();
                                        AttackingOn2.PoisonPlayer();
                                        usingSpecial = false;
                                        specialDamage = 0;
                                        specialDamage2 = 0;
                                    }
                if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7810) { // Dclaws
                    if (FightType == 3) // slash
                    {
                        return 451;
                    }
                }
